all_questions.question: what did he do at his last job?
all_questions.reply:
At Pita Pit India, Saksham was the Business Strategy & Growth Lead from January 2024 to March 2025. He led GTM, growth, and operational scale-up for Pita Pit’s NCR launch and expansion across 11 outlets. He delivered ₹50L+ GMV in 12 months, sustained double-digit MoM growth, served 100K+ customers, reduced outlet payback period from 18 to 12 months, and maintained >95% service quality during 5–10× demand spikes.

For the full profile, see the Work page: /work

all_questions.question: how does he handle conflict
all_questions.reply: Saksham earns credibility through clarity, ownership, and consistent execution. This strengthened working relationships and increased his credibility across the team.
